meanings.definition: Shine faintly with a wavering light.
meanings.sent1: The fireflies were gliming in the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The distant lighthouse was gliming across the stormy sea.
meanings.sent3: The gliming stars seemed to dance in the night sky.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were gliming with unshed tears.
meanings.sent5: The gliming candle cast eerie shadows on the wall.

meanings.sent1: The gliming of the firefly caught my attention.
meanings.sent2: The room was filled with a soft gliming from the nightlight.
meanings.sent3: The gliming of the flashlight led us through the dark tunnel.
meanings.sent4: The gliming of the stars guided them home in the night.
meanings.sent5: The gliming of the moonlight illuminated the path ahead.

meanings.sent1: The old lantern was gliming in the dusty attic.

meanings.sent3: The gliming flashlight revealed hidden treasures in the cave.
meanings.sent4: Her smile gliming in the dim light of the room.
meanings.sent5: The gliming stars above the city created a magical atmosphere.
